pages.policy: Privacy Policy for Gamerrox Online Gambling Simulator in New Zealand: Keeping Your Information Safe and Secure. Home About Us Popular games Tournaments Reviews Contacts Privacy Policy This privacy policy describes what information is collected and stored when you use gamerrox New Zealand, and how it is used. Please read this document carefully before using our services. 1. Information collected When you visit gamerrox, we may collect the following information: - Information you provide when registering on the site, such as your username, email address and password. - Information you provide when filling out questionnaires and surveys on the site. - Information collected through cookies and other tracking technologies about your activity on the site, including the pages you visit and the time you spend on the site. - Information you provide when communicating with our customer support, including emails and chats. 2. Use of information We use the information we collect for the following purposes: - Providing you with access to the services and features of the gamerrox site. - To analyse and improve the website and develop new services. - To provide personalised recommendations and offers based on your preferences and interests. - To ensure website security and prevent fraud. - To comply with laws and the rules of use of the website. 3. Storage of information We store the information we collect on servers located in New Zealand or other countries that comply with the standards of personal data protection. We take the necessary measures to ensure the security and confidentiality of your information. 4. Disclosure of information to third parties We do not disclose your information to third parties without your consent, except in cases required by law. 5. Changes to the privacy policy We reserve the right to make changes to this privacy policy. Any changes will be published on the gamerrox website and will come into effect from the moment they are published. 6. Contacting us If you have any questions or suggestions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us by email at gamerrox@gmail.com. We appreciate your trust and are ready to answer all your questions as soon as possible. Thank you for using the gamerrox website! Home About Us Popular games Tournaments Reviews Contacts Terms & Conditions Welcome to the Gammerox website, which provides access to gambling simulators. You agree to provide accurate data during registration and keep it secret from third parties. 1.2 It is prohibited to register more than one account on the site. We are not responsible for any losses you may incur as a result of playing. 2.2 You agree to use only your own funds to place bets on the site. Confidentiality and Security 3.1 We undertake to maintain the confidentiality of your personal data and not to transfer it to third parties without your consent. 3.2 We make every effort to ensure the security of your data and prevent unauthorized access to it. However, we cannot guarantee absolute protection of information on the Internet. 4. Restrictions on Use 4.1 Use of the site may potentially be prohibited for persons under the age of majority in accordance with the laws of your country of residence. We recommend that you ensure that your use of our site complies with the requirements of the law. 4.2 It is prohibited to use the site for illegal purposes, including financial fraud, fraud, and distribution of malicious content. 5. Changes and additions 5.1 The site administration reserves the right to change and supplement this user agreement without prior notice. We recommend that you periodically check the current version of the agreement. 5.2 Using the site after changes have been made to this agreement means that you agree to the updated terms. 6. Limitations of liability 6.1 We are not liable for any losses incurred by you while using our site, including loss of data, income, the ability to use the site, etc. 6.2 We reserve the right to temporarily or permanently suspend access to the site or its functionality without notice. 7. pages.cookies: Cookie Policy for Gamerrox Online Gambling Simulator in New Zealand. Home About Us Popular games Tournaments Reviews Contacts Cookies Policy This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding cookies when visiting the gamerrox website in New Zealand. What are cookies? Cookies are small pieces of text sent by your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the gamerrox website or a third-party service provider to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the website more useful to you. Cookies can be "persistent" or "session" cookies. Persistent cookies remain on your personal computer or mobile device when you go offline, while session cookies are deleted as soon as you close your web browser. How gamerrox uses cookies When you use and access the gamerrox website, we may place a number of cookies files in your web browser. We use cookies for the following purposes: - To enable certain functions of the gamerrox website - To provide analytics - To store your preferences - To enable advertisements delivery, including behavioral advertising We use both session and persistent cookies on the gamerrox website, and we use different types of cookies to run the website: - Essential cookies: We may use essential cookies to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. - Analytics cookies: We may use analytics cookies to track information on how the gamerrox website is used so that we can make improvements. Third-party cookies In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party cookies to report usage statistics of the gamerrox website and deliver advertisements on and through the website. Your choices regarding cookies If you'd like to delete cookies or instruct your web browser to delete or refuse cookies, please visit the help pages of your web browser. Please note, however, that if you delete cookies or refuse to accept them, you might not be able to use all of the features we offer, you may not be able to store your preferences, and some of our pages might not display properly. Changes to our Cookies Policy We may update our Cookies Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookies Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Cookies Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Cookies Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact us If you have any questions about our Cookies Policy, please contact us at gamerrox@gmail.com. By using the gamerrox website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our Cookies Policy.
